node.doctext:
This is a super utility belt that belongs to [N-Wing] (wow, that was tough to figure out, huh?)

change writeup information
note: for some reason, a non-standard writeup type won't stick if you edit the writeup the normal way
[{openform}] [% #Change Writeup Information my $str = ''; my $wuid = $query->param('cwi_wuid') || 0; if($wuid) { $wuid=0 unless $wuid=~/^\d+$/; } my $idLoaded = $query->param('cwi_wuid_loaded') || 0; if($idLoaded) { $idLoaded=0 unless ($idLoaded=~/^\d+$/) && ($wuid==$idLoaded); } # $str .= 'DEBUG: param="'.$query->param('cwi_wuid_loaded') . '", $idLoaded='.$idLoaded."
\n"; $wuid = '' unless $wuid; $query->param('cwi_wuid',$wuid); $query->param('cwi_wuid_loaded',$wuid) unless $idLoaded; $str .= 'writeup node_id: '.$query->textfield('cwi_wuid')."
\n"; return $str unless $wuid && ($wuid ne ''); $str .= $query->hidden('cwi_wuid_loaded',$wuid); my $WU = getNodeById($wuid); return $str . 'there is no node with node_id='.$wuid unless $WU; return $str . 'node_id='.$wuid.' is not a writeup' unless $$WU{type_nodetype}==117; #FIXME unhardcode 117 my $tmp; my $N; my $v; my $w; #display title $str .= 'writeup title: "'.linkNode($WU,0,{lastnode_id=>0})."\"
\n"; ##display author #my $WUA = getNodeById($tmp=$$WU{author_user}) || 0; #$tmp = 0 unless $WUA; #$str .= 'writeup author: node_id='.($tmp ? $tmp : '(unknown)').'; name='.($tmp ? linkNode($WUA,0,{lastnode_id=>0}) : '(unknown)')."
\n"; #change writeup type $tmp = $$WU{wrtype_writeuptype}; $v=$idLoaded ? $query->param('cwi_wutype') : 0; if($v && ($v=~/^\d$/)) { $v=0 unless $N=getNodeById($v); } if($v) { $$WU{wrtype_writeuptype}=$v; } else { $N=getNodeById($v=$tmp); } $query->param('cwi_wutype',$v); $str .= 'writeup type: current writeup type node_id='.$tmp.($N ? ' ('.linkNode($N,0,{lastnode_id=>0}).')' : '').'; new node_id='.$query->textfield('cwi_wutype').' (249=person, 250=thing, 251=idea, 252=place, 177599=definiton, 364471=E2 Bugs, 838015=edev group)
'."\n"; #change author #TODO make general for any node my $WUA = getNodeById($tmp=$$WU{author_user}) || 0; $tmp=0 unless $WUA; $str .= 'writeup author: current node_id='.($tmp ? $tmp : '(unknown)').'; current title='.($tmp ? linkNode($WUA,0,{lastnode_id=>0}) : '(unknown)'); $N=0; if($idLoaded) { $v = $query->param('cwi_author') || 0; $w=$v; #what user attempted to change to if($v) { if($v =~ /^(.*)$/) { $v = $1; } else { $v = 0; } } if($v) { $v =~ s/[^a-zA-Z_0-9 \-]//g; } #probably need to allow more things $v=0 unless length($v); if($v) { $N = (($v =~ /^\d+$/) ? getNodeById($v) : getNode($v,'user')) || 0; } if($N) { if($$N{type_nodetype}==15) { #FIXME unhardcode 15 (user nodetype) $str .= '; changed node_id='.getId($N).'; changed title='.linkNode($N,0,{lastnode_id=>0}); $query->param('cwi_author',$$N{title}); $$WU{author_user} = getId($N); } else { $str .= '; ('.linkNode($N,0,{lastnode_id=>0}).' is not a user)'; $N = 0; } } else { $str .= '; (unable to find a user with title or node_id of "'.$w.'", which was converted to "'.$v.'" after filtering; if you think that name was valid, please tell N-Wing the user name (and for now, use the user\'s node_id instead))'; } } #if($idLoaded) $query->param('cwi_author',$tmp?$$WUA{title}:'') unless $N; $str .= '; new name or node_id='.$query->textfield('cwi_author')."
\n"; # $str .= "
If there is something else you'd like to change in a writeup, send N-Wing a /msg .
\n"; #save changes return $str unless $idLoaded; updateNode($WU,-1); $str .= 'updated writeup (node_id='.$idLoaded.")
\n"; $str; %] [{closeform}] [% linkNode($NODE,'start over'); %]
node.title: N-Wing's super utility belt
